item.description: To make sure you don’t make a mistake while buying a ring online, the AurianeJewelry team has prepared a small size guide with several options available to you. Otherwise, to make sure you don’t make a mistake, you can always come and try the rings on in the Showroom. Moreover, if you bought one of […]
item.content:encoded:
To make sure you don’t make a mistake while buying a ring online, the AurianeJewelry team has prepared a small size guide with several options available to you. Otherwise, to make sure you don’t make a mistake, you can always come and try the rings on in the Showroom.

Moreover, if you bought one of our rings and the size does not suit you, you can always come and exchange it for another size in our shop! Partili enem amir. item.title: AGTA GemFair 2020 at the Tucson Gem Show
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Mayer & Watt’s tagline this year may have been #SpotTheGecko but I found something else at their booth — this drool-worthy watermelon tourmaline slice.
item.content:encoded: Mayer & Watt’s tagline this year may have been #SpotTheGecko but I found something else at their booth — this drool-worthy watermelon tourmaline slice.

item.title: The size guide: a little help to avoid mistakes
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: To be sure not to go wrong when you want to buy a ring online, the Jewelry team has prepared a small size guide with several options available to you.
item.content:encoded: To be sure not to go wrong when you want to buy a ring online, the Jewelry team has prepared a small size guide with several options available to you.
